pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, November 10, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister, along with Minister of National Defence Anita Anand and Canada’s Ambassador for Women, Peace and Security Jacqueline O’Neill, will meet with the 2021 class of the Halifax Peace With Women Fellowship.

Closed to media

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will be sworn in as the Member of Parliament for Papineau.

Closed to media
